program main

implicit none

integer :: res, N, K, i, j, a, b, current, state, c, total, MOD=1000000007

character(len=100000) :: s

character(len=2) :: pair

integer, dimension(0:2000, 0:63) :: memo

integer :: count_result

character(len=20) :: result_str

character :: first_char, new_char

! First part:

read(*, '(A)') s

read(*, *) K

res =0

do i=1, K

   read(*, '(A2)') pair

   a =0

   b =0

   do j=1, len_trim(s)

      if (s(j:j) == pair(1:1)) then

          a = a +1

      else if (s(j:j) == pair(2:2)) then

          b = b +1

      else

          res = res + min(a, b)

          a =0

          b =0

      end if

   end do

   res = res + min(a, b)

end do

! Second part:

N = res

! Initialize memo array

memo = -1

! Base case: current = N, all states have 1 way

do state =0, 63

   memo(N, state) =1

end do

! Fill memo from N-1 down to 0

do current = N-1, 0, -1

   do state =0, 63

      if (memo(current, state) == -1) then

          total =0

          do c=0,3 ! A, C, G, T

              ! decode previous three characters from state

              integer :: c1, c2, c3

              c1 = state /16

              remainder = mod(state,16)

              c2 = remainder /4

              c3 = mod(remainder,4)

              ! new_char is c (0-3)

              ! form four_char string

              character(len=4) :: four_char

              four_char = code_to_char(c1) // code_to_char(c2) // code_to_char(c3) // code_to_char(c)

              if (isOK(four_char)) then

                  ! compute new_state

                  new_state = ( (state mod 16)*4 + c )

                  total = total + memo(current+1, new_state)

              end if

          end do

          memo(current, state) = mod(total, MOD)

      end if

   end do

end do

count_result = memo(0, 63)

! Third part:

write(result_str, '(I0)') count_result

first_char = result_str(1:1)

new_char = char(ichar(first_char) +1)

print *, new_char

! Functions

integer function char_code(c)

   character, intent(in) :: c

   select case (c)

   case ('A')

      char_code =0

   case ('C')

      char_code =1

   case ('G')

      char_code =2

   case ('T')

      char_code =3

   end select

end function

character(len=1) function code_to_char(code)

   integer, intent(in) :: code

   select case (code)

   case (0)

      code_to_char = 'A'

   case (1)

      code_to_char = 'C'

   case (2)

      code_to_char = 'G'

   case (3)

      code_to_char = 'T'

   end select

end function

logical function isOK(four_char)

   character(len=4), intent(in) :: four_char

   logical :: contains_AGC

   contains_AGC = index(four_char, 'AGC') >0

   if (contains_AGC) then

      isOK = .false.

      return

   end if

   integer :: i

   character(len=4) :: temp

   do i=1,3

      temp = four_char

      temp(i:i+1) = temp(i+1:i+1) // temp(i:i)

      if (index(temp, 'AGC') >0) then

          isOK = .false.

          return

      end if

   end do

   isOK = .true.

end function

end program
